'Sodium triphosphate' (STP, sometimes STPP or sodium tripolyphosphate or
TPP, ) is an inorganic compound with formula
Na 5P 3O 10 . It is the sodium salt of the
polyphosphate penta-anion, which is the conjugate base of triphosphoric acid. It
is produced on a large scale as a component of many domestic and industrial
products, especially detergents. Environmental problems associated with
eutrophication are attributed to its widespread use.
